data.text: Kuye mu xinbelima sogofure ra,
Dankɛ mu mixi fanyi suxuma.
Soe bɔnbɔma nɛ alako a xa a gi,
I naxa xaxilitare yaabi a maɲɔxun ki ra,
I xa xaxilitare yaabi a maɲɔxun ki ma,
Mixi naxan xaxilitare xɛɛma masenyi nde tide,
Taali wɔyɛnyi naxan minima xaxilitare dɛ i,
Xaxilitare binyafe luxi nɛ alɔ gɛmɛ safe laati kui.
Taali wɔyɛnyi naxan minima xaxilitare dɛ i,
Mixi naxan wali soma xaxilitare yi ra,
Xaxilitare naxan gbilenma a xa daxuɲa ma,
Xaxilitare fan fisa mixi bɛ naxan a yɛtɛ findixi lɔnnila ra.
Mixi tunnaxɔnɔxi nan a falama,
Naadɛ rabima, a man nagalima,
Mixi tunnaxɔnɔxi a donse suxuma a bɛlɛxɛ ra,
Mixi tunnaxɔnɔxi a yɛtɛ rafisa xaxilima solofere bɛ
Dangi mixi naxan a yɛtɛ rasoma gere kui naxan mu a matoxi,
Mixi naxan a boore madaxu, a fa a fala, «Bere nan nu a ra,»
Xa yege mu na, tɛ xubenma nɛ.
Tige findima nɛ tɛ wole ra, yege findi tɛ ra.
Naafixi xa masenyi luxi nɛ alɔ donse ɲɔxunmɛ,
Mixi ɲaaxi naxan wɔyɛn ɲɔxunmɛ falama,
Mixi ɲaaxi a boore madaxuma wɔyɛn ɲɔxunmɛ ra,
Hali a wɔyɛnyi ɲɔxun, i naxa la a ra de,
A xa xɔnnanteya nɔxunxi a xa mayendenyi saabui ra,
Mixi naxan yili gema gantanyi ra,
Wule falɛ tɔɔɲɛgɛtɔɛ nan xɔnma,
